requirement_tested: A homepage displaying featured technical articles and solutions
user_persona: A tech enthusiast visiting the site for the first time.
user_goal: To quickly find interesting technical content from the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the website and lands on the homepage. He sees a hero banner followed by sections for featured articles and solutions.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Homepage loads successfully with a hero banner, and two distinct sections showing featured articles and solutions with titles, summaries, and authors.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Featured Content
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by a featured article titled 'Understanding Kubernetes Networking', Alex clicks on it to read more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a featured article card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: User is redirected to the detailed view page of the selected article.

requirement_tested: A dedicated page for browsing technical articles with filtering options
user_persona: A developer looking for web development resources.
user_goal: To filter and find relevant technical articles by category and tags.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Articles Page
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clicks on the 'Articles' link in the navigation bar to explore available content.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Articles' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the articles browsing page displaying a grid/list of articles.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering by Category
narrative_steps.description: Jamie selects 'Web Development' from the category filter dropdown to narrow down the list.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Web Development' from the category filter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article list updates dynamically to show only articles under the 'Web Development' category.

narrative_steps.title: Further Filtering by Tag
narrative_steps.description: Wanting more precision, Jamie checks the 'React' tag checkbox to further refine results.
narrative_steps.action: Check the 'React' tag filter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only articles tagged with 'React' within the 'Web Development' category are displayed.

requirement_tested: A search functionality to find technical information across articles and solutions
user_persona: A DevOps engineer needing quick answers.
user_goal: To search for specific technical topics using keywords.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Casey types 'CI/CD pipeline optimization' into the global search bar located in the header.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'CI/CD pipeline optimization' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Autocomplete dropdown appears showing matching articles and solutions with titles and snippets.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Query
narrative_steps.description: After seeing some suggestions, Casey presses Enter to see all results related to the query.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter key or click the search icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a full search results page listing all matching articles and solutions.

requirement_tested: A detailed view page for each technical article
user_persona: A software engineer researching microservices architecture.
user_goal: To read a full article and engage with the community through comments.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Article Content
narrative_steps.description: Morgan opens an article about 'Building Resilient Microservices' and scrolls through the formatted content.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the article detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Complete article content is displayed in proper formatting along with author info and publish date.

narrative_steps.title: Adding a Comment
narrative_steps.description: Finding the article insightful, Morgan logs in and leaves a comment sharing additional insights.
narrative_steps.action: Log in if needed, then enter a comment and click 'Post Comment'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Comment is posted successfully and appears immediately below the article without reloading the page.

requirement_tested: A section for browsing and viewing solutions with categorization
user_persona: An IT professional troubleshooting deployment issues.
user_goal: To find categorized solutions based on problem domain and complexity.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Solutions Section
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks on the 'Solutions' link in the navigation menu to look for troubleshooting guides.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Solutions' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the solutions browsing page with categorized solution cards displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering by Difficulty Level
narrative_steps.description: Looking for something straightforward, Taylor chooses the 'Beginner' difficulty filter.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Beginner' difficulty level.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only beginner-level solutions are shown, each marked with a corresponding icon.

requirement_tested: A detailed view page for each solution
user_persona: A junior developer implementing a security fix.
user_goal: To follow step-by-step instructions for applying a security patch.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Solution Details
narrative_steps.description: Jordan navigates to a solution titled 'Securing Node.js Applications Against XSS Attacks' to get implementation guidance.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a solution card from the browsing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Detailed view page loads showing step-by-step instructions, code snippets, and attachments.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Related Solutions
narrative_steps.description: At the bottom, Jordan notices a related solution on CSRF protection and clicks to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a related solution card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the detail page of the clicked related solution.

user_persona: A new visitor wanting to participate in discussions.
user_goal: To create an account and log in to start contributing.

narrative_steps.title: Registering New Account
narrative_steps.description: Riley finds the 'Login/Register' link and decides to sign up by filling out the registration form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out the registration form with username, email, password, and confirm password, then click 'Register'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Account is created successfully and Riley is automatically logged in and redirected to the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In Again
narrative_steps.description: After logging out, Riley returns later and logs back in using the login form.
narrative_steps.action: Enter username/email and password in the login form, then click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successfully authenticated and redirected to the homepage with a welcome message.

requirement_tested: A user profile page showing activity and contributions
user_persona: An active contributor reviewing their impact.
user_goal: To view personal activity history and contributions made to the platform.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Profile Page
narrative_steps.description: Sammy clicks on their profile link in the navigation bar to check their contributions.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the user profile link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Profile page loads showing avatar, username, join date, bio, and lists of contributed articles/solutions.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Bio Information
narrative_steps.description: Seeing an outdated bio, Sammy clicks 'Edit Profile' to update it.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Edit Profile' and update the bio field, then save changes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Bio is updated successfully and changes are reflected immediately on the profile page.

requirement_tested: A discussion or comment system for users to communicate on articles and solutions
user_goal: To help others by replying to questions in the comments section.

narrative_steps.title: Replying to a Comment
narrative_steps.description: While reading an article, Dana notices a question in the comments and clicks 'Reply' to provide an answer.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Reply' button under a comment.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A reply text box appears directly beneath the original comment.

narrative_steps.title: Posting the Reply
narrative_steps.description: Dana writes a helpful explanation in the reply box and submits it.
narrative_steps.action: Write the reply and click the submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Reply is posted successfully and nested under the original comment with correct attribution.

requirement_tested: Real-time messaging or chat functionality between users
user_persona: A project manager coordinating with developers.
user_goal: To discuss urgent tasks with team members via real-time chat.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Chat Interface
narrative_steps.description: Pat opens the chat window and selects a developer from the contact list to ask about progress.
narrative_steps.action: Open the chat interface and select a contact from the sidebar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Conversation history with the selected user loads in the main chat area.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Instant Message
narrative_steps.description: Pat types a quick update request and hits send, expecting an immediate response.
narrative_steps.action: Type a message in the input box and click the send button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message is delivered instantly to the recipient and appears in both users' chat windows in real time.

requirement_tested: Backend API endpoints for fetching articles, solutions, and user data
user_persona: A frontend developer integrating with backend services.
user_goal: To retrieve article data using backend APIs for frontend rendering.

narrative_steps.title: Fetching Articles List
narrative_steps.description: Alex makes a GET request to the articles endpoint to fetch a list of published articles.
narrative_steps.action: Make a GET request to '/api/articles'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Receive a JSON response containing a list of articles with essential metadata.

narrative_steps.title: Fetching Single Article Detail
narrative_steps.description: Next, Alex requests detailed data for a specific article by ID.
narrative_steps.action: Make a GET request to '/api/articles/{id}'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Receive a JSON response with full article content and related author information.

requirement_tested: Database schema design supporting articles, solutions, users, and communications
user_persona: A backend developer setting up the database.
user_goal: To verify that database tables are structured according to specifications.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Articles Table Structure
narrative_steps.description: Jordan connects to the PostgreSQL database and inspects the schema of the articles table.
narrative_steps.action: Run SQL command to describe the structure of the 'articles' table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table schema matches specification with fields like id, title, summary, category, author_id, created_at, updated_at, is_featured.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Foreign Key Relationships
narrative_steps.description: Jordan verifies that foreign key constraints are properly set up between articles and users.
narrative_steps.action: Query the foreign key constraints on the articles table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Foreign key constraint exists linking author_id in articles table to id in users table.

requirement_tested: Frontend components dynamically fetching all content from backend APIs
user_persona: A QA engineer validating frontend behavior.
user_goal: To ensure all frontend components load data dynamically from backend APIs.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Articles Component
narrative_steps.description: Taylor navigates to the articles browsing page and observes how content is loaded.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the articles browsing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Articles list is populated dynamically by making API calls; no hard-coded or mock data is present.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Dynamic Fetching
narrative_steps.description: Taylor applies a filter and confirms that the component re-fetches data accordingly.
narrative_steps.action: Apply a category filter on the articles page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Component re-renders with filtered data fetched from the backend API without page reload.

requirement_tested: Package.json configured with 'install:all' and 'dev' scripts as specified
user_persona: A new team member setting up the project locally.
user_goal: To install dependencies and run both frontend and backend concurrently.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Casey clones the repository and runs the script to install all necessary packages.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run install:all' in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both client and server are installed successfully in parallel.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Once installation completes, Casey starts both development environments.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run dev' in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend development servers start concurrently and are accessible.

requirement_tested: Environment variable configuration for PostgreSQL database connection
user_persona: A DevOps engineer deploying the application.
user_goal: To configure and validate database connectivity using environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Up Environment Variables
narrative_steps.description: Morgan creates a .env file in the backend directory with the required database credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Create a .env file with DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: .env file is created with correct values matching the specification.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Database Connection
narrative_steps.description: Morgan starts the backend server and checks logs to confirm successful database connection.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server and monitor startup logs.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Logs indicate successful connection to the PostgreSQL database using the configured environment variables.
